name: 2025 7th International Conference on BioMedical Technology
content: Paper Publication: International Journal of Pharma Medicine and Biological Sciences (IJPMBS, ISSN: 2278-5221), which will be indexed by Embase, CNKI, ProQuest, etc. International Journal of Engineering and Technology (IJET, ISBN: 1793-8236), which will be indexed by Inspec (IET), CNKI, Google Scholar, EBSCO, ProQuest, Crossref, etc.
organizers: Hong Kong Chemical, Biological & Environmental Engineering Society (HKCBEES)
